features: 【𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝟑𝐃 𝐅𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐞𝐫𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐃𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐤】: SMONET Smart Lock can recognize your fingerprint in just 0.5 seconds, and unlock your door in 1 second, faster than fumbling for your keys.

【𝟕 𝐢𝐧 𝟏 𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐃𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐤】: 7 ways to unlock your door - APP, Keypad, Fingerprint, iWatch, Voice Control, IC Fob and Mechanical Keys. Paring with Smonet wifi gateway, device user could remotely control your smart door lock anywhere anytime, set up codes remotely and check real-time access log.

【𝐂𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭】: Sign in APP of Bluetooth Locks for Front Door, you could check the records about unlocking and wrong passcode in real time. Code Door Lock allow setting to generate Timed, Permanent, One-time or Customized passcode for guests, friends, housekeepers or employees.

【𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐃𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞】: Intuitive touchscreen display, Alloy body, Long Battery Life, 4pcs AA batteries can provide 10,000 openings (approx. 12 months), For security reason, it will automatically lock for 5 minutes when enter the password incorrectly more than 5 times. A great solution for home hotel Airbnb etc.
【𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥】: With only a screwdriver and 10 minutes of your time, you can easily install our electronic door lock yourself, saving you money on contractor fees.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page smonet smart lock Your Finger is the Key Recognizes your fingerprint in less than 0.3s, cutting out the time waiting at the door. smonet smart lock App Remote Control With its SMONET G2 gateway(Sold Separately), you can control your lock from anywhere via the app. smonet smart lock Voice Control Hands full when the doorbell rings? Use your voice to unlock your front door completely hands-free. smonet smart lock Passcode Set passcodes for family, guests, or service people. Disable individual codes as needed. smonet smart lock Compatible with Apple Watch One-touch unlock with Apple Watch within range of the lock. Next page 1 Fingerprint Unlocking 2 App Control 3 Voice Control 4 Passcode Unlock 5 iWatch Unlock

Previous page smonet Smart Lock Decide Who Has Access You can manage, create, or delete user profiles—even for guests. smonet Smart Lock Stay in the Know Enjoy peace of mind with every door activity visible in the event history. smonet Smart Lock Anti-Peeping Touchscreen Keypad Entering random numbers before or after the correct password will also unlock the door. smonet Smart Lock Privacy Mode Once enabled, only the admin password or physical key can unlock, providing additional security. smonet Smart Lock Low Battery Alert Door lock will remind you when the battery is low and you can check the battery in the app. Next page 1 Access Management 2 Real Time Notification 3 Anti-Peep Keypad 4 Privacy Mode 5 Low Battery Alert

Previous page smonet Smart Lock Auto Lock & One Touch Lock Automatic locking can be set 5-900s, holding the "#" key for 2 seconds. smonet Smart Lock Remote APP & Web Management With SMONET G2 Gateway (Sold Separately), you can control and manage smart lock in the app and web. smonet Smart Lock Wrong Entry Limit After 5 times failed attempts at entering invalid password, the lock will shut down for 2 minutes. smonet Smart Lock Built to Last Verified by Transparency,you can scan the QR code to verify authenticity. smonet Smart Lock Remote Monitoring Lock Status With SMONET G2 Gateway (Sold Separately), you can remotely monitor the unlocked/locked status. Next page 1 Auto Lock 2 Web Portal Management 3 Wrong Entry Limit 4 Long-Lasting 5 Remote Monitoring Lock
Previous page Next page 1 Front Door 2 Garage Door 3 Back Door 4 Airbnb 5 Side Door

How many passcodes and fingerprints can the smonet Smart Lock store? Up to 300 different passcodes and 250 fingerprints. How long does the battery last？How to unlock Smart Deadbolt Lock when the battery dies? Roughly 12 months(One Year) depending on usage(10 times unlock through keypad or app). You'll get a notification when the battery is low. If the battery dies, you can power it up via the port on the bottom of the exterior lock. What temperatures can the Smonet Smart Lock stay? The exterior assembly can handle temperatures within the range of -22℉ to 158℉ (-30℃ to 70℃). We do not recommend using the Smart Lock outside of these conditions. Whats the requirement for installation? Please check the Compatibility infographic above for specific requirement. Dimensions required: Crossbore center to the top of handleset greater than 40 mm; Door thickness: 38 mm-48 mm. NOT Compatible with Mortise Lock. How many ways can be used to unlock smonet Smart lock? 7 ways to unlock your door - APP, Keypad, Fingerprint, iWatch, Voice Control, IC Fob and Mechanical Keys. Paring with Smonet wifi gateway, device user could remotely control your smart door lock anywhere anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use smart deadbolt
reviews.reviewText: This SMONET smart deadbolt has transformed the way I secure my home. Installation was a breeze, and the smart features are a game-changer. With remote access via the app, customizable access codes, and seamless integration with virtual assistants, it offers unparalleled convenience and peace of mind. The sleek design adds a modern touch to my door, and the build quality feels solid. If you're looking for a reliable and easy-to-use smart lock, look no further than this smart deadbolt. It's a worthwhile investment for any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lock for the price. Even better customer service.
reviews.reviewText: I bought the previous version of this lock earlier this year and it was a great lock. Fingerprint reader works very well, the RFID reader is amazing and the integration with the phone was pretty good. The touch pad was not the most responsive, but since I mostly used the fingerprint reader, it wasn't too much of a problem.After a while, the lock stop working so I contacted their customer support and they immediately responded within 24hrs. They asked me about the issue with the lock and they decided to replace the lock with this version (newer version) since mine was under warranty. They shipped it right away and I was able to get it within a few days.Couple things I've noticed about this newer version: The fingerprint sensor is a bit larger so its easier to place your finger on the sensor. The locking motor mechanism is a lot better and the motor seems to work with ease. The overall size of the lock has improved making it smaller and slightly more compact. What I was happy to see is that the issue I had with the touchpad was resolved with this newer model and the touch pad is very responsive. Only noticeable difference is that the previous version had a cover over the keyhole, which I wish they still had that for this version.Overall, it's a great lock. It's not perfect since I had some issues trying to connect it to my smart home, but there was no issues with it pairing with the app. Even though it's probably not the most high end lock, The reason I'm giving them a great rating is because of their customer service. Sure, I had to get out of my way to contact them and prove to them my lock wasn't actually working (which I don't blame them for that), but they had excellent customer service with quick response time and very friendly staff.If you're looking to buy a decent smart lock at a good price range, from a company you can trust to provide support if something goes wrong, I say this lock is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure, Safe, and Easy to install and use
reviews.reviewText: I did a lot of work before selecting a new smart lock to replace what the developer put into 1,000 houses here. Mine went bad the moment I moved in. Most of the rest of the community still have no idea how to use them or connect them to one system. Everything the developer choose was based upon cost, not use. Thermostat, garage door opene, locks, doorbell cameras, none work together.This one is great! Easy to install. Easy to setup in its own app. Automatic synchronisation with Alexa. Finger prints are super easy to set up. Fobs too.I went down to Lowes to have duplicate keys made. They had a sign up saying they now make fobs too. However, they had no blank keys to cut for this type of lock. And their dib machine could not read my fob. That tells me the depth of the security for this lock. Very Impressive! No one else will be able to make duplicates either! Something about bank level encryption being used. Super!This lock also tells me when it is locked or when it is unlocked. That is very comforting to know as I walk out the door.The app is perhaps the easiest app I have ever used for "Smart Stuff". Some require a Doctorate in Computer Science and Programming to use. It has been a while since I had to write code for something. I really do not want to do that anymore if I can avoid it.I added a reinforced deadbolt striker that extends three inches into the door frame. Between it and this lock, someone is going to have a very difficult time breaking in.The most important thing is the voice control. There are days when my pain is just too much to get out of bed. With this lock, and Alexa, I can control the lock on my front door. I can see who is at my door through Blink. Now I can let them in when I need help. For me, that is priceless. My family knows this too and they also have voice control and Alexa control from Hawaii if they need it. That is the purpose of all of this high tech. Peace of mind.It works every time!Great App, easy to use and understand.Easy installation.Simple setup for Voice, Finger print, and Fob.Integrates seamlessly with Alexa.A double locking mechanism included.Good looking too!Small footprint.Great instructions.Everything you need (except tools) are in the box. And the instructions actually make sense.I give this 5 big stars, only because I cannot give six!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really Good Product with one major issue
reviews.reviewText: First of all, let me say that costumer service was incredible and very easy to work with. The door lock has a lot of features and the fingerprint sensor works flawlessly. I also enjoyed taking advantage of a lot of great features , such as auto lock, finger print reader, multiple codes to get in, easy to use app etc.After 6 weeks the door lock started glitching until it stopped working. I contacted costumer service and apparently it wasn't a faulty unit , but if water gets inside it damages the motherboard which is exactly what happened. They sent me a replacement and I put duct tape to cover up the key hole and the USB charging port to prevent water from getting in. Hopefully this will prevent the lock from breaking again since this is being used in my backdoor and it is exposed to rain, wind, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall great and broad range of options to unlock and lock your door
reviews.reviewText: I love the multifunctionality of these locks. We use the ability to create codes for people we need to let in our house, to unlock remotely if last minute, the fingerprint is awesome and you still have the option for the key fob or keys. Our family loves them and even my wife who is not tech savvy enjoys the locks.I had one small issue with one of the 3 locks I bought and Customer Service was all over it. To me, that is everything you need as nothing is perfect, but if it goes wrong, you want support with it.I'd recommend these locks to anyone. Oh, the app is easy to setup and use. Big time winner here.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exceptional Product with Outstanding Aftermarket Service! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the SMONET Fingerprint Electronic Deadbolt Door Lock with Keypad-Bluetooth Keyless Entry for over 1.5 years now, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance. From day one, it has consistently exceeded my expectations, providing unmatched convenience and security for my home.One of the standout features of this smart deadbolt is its seamless integration with my smartphone. Whether I'm using the fingerprint recognition, keypad, or Bluetooth keyless entry, accessing my home has never been easier. Plus, the ability to share Ekeys with family and friends has made hosting guests a breeze. This feature becomes incredibly handy when coordinating with a dog walker, making it effortless to grant access to my home when I'm away.But what truly sets this smart lock apart is the exceptional after-market service provided by SMONET. Anytime I've had a question or needed assistance, their support team has been prompt, knowledgeable, and incredibly helpful. It's reassuring to know that I have such reliable support backing me up.I'm not the only one in my circle who's been impressed with this smart deadbolt. I've already recommended it to several family members and friends, and three of them are now happily using it in their own homes.To top it off, I also use the Smart Lock Wi-Fi Gateway as an add-on, which allows me to control and monitor my lock from anywhere in the world. It's added an extra layer of convenience and peace of mind to my daily life.In summary, I couldn't be happier with my SMONET Smart Deadbolt. It's reliable, user-friendly, and backed by exceptional after-sales support. If you're in the market for a smart lock, look no further – this one truly delivers on its promises.

So far so good. I live in Northern Ontario where we are currently in our false spring. The fingerprint is very touchy so make sure that you put your finger on there exactly how you programmed it or else it won’t work the first couple times. Auto lock feature is great. I seriously do love how you can control basically all of the settings on your phone. Works very well with my Amazon Alexa and Google Home. I do love how it tells you out loud if you have it programmed to do so that it is unlocked or locked. I also have a ring doorbell so it’s nice to know when someone is there and I can unlock the door for them from my phone wherever I am if needed. Installation was a breeze but I use to work with a locksmith so this was nothing new for me. It’s a great little lock I must say. I’ve only ran into maybe five instances where the touchpad was a little delayed for my liking but that was just more of me being in a rush in those moments. Great if you have kids. It keeps a log of who comes in the house at what times if they used a code or their fingerprint or their key card. You can have your own profiles with fingerprint, code or keycard attached. It’s some pretty nifty tech !
I am very satisfied with this lock. Easy to use, the batteries last for a long time, good looking design, easy to install.

reviews.reviewTitle: **UPDATE** faulty product, not as great as I thought
reviews.reviewText: Need to update this review, it’s been about a year a a bit since we’ve had it and had to replace it already. Initial thoughts and feelings about this deadbolt were great however it is not built to last. The motor mechanism with in the deadbolt becomes so weak and fails to turn the latch to lock. We’ve been looked out of our garage numerous times having to go around to the front door and then unlock the door from the inside. Luckily the vendor sent a replacement but it’s the same thing about 3-4 months in. I wouldn’t trust this device if you rely on the finger print, key code or key fob scan to get in. You’d definitely need the key with you because it fails often.Bought this lock to replace an older manual deadbolt. It was somewhat easy to install, but I did have to widen the door hole with a door bore to make it fit to size. So many features and ways to unlock which is so great. The finger print scanner is by far the coolest and easiest way to unlock. We have also set a timer to auto lock so if we ever forget to lock the door it does it on its own. Very happy wife, happy house!

Our family of 5 adults love the ease of use. The fingerprint reader has been working great for us but we did add more than one copy of each of our fingerprints. We do live it but wish the app would show an unlocked icon when it is unlocked. At present it only shows a locked icon and if we want to be sure it is unlocked or locked without going to it we have to press the icon to find out.
